snippet: The transfer from one military commander to another turned out to be far less smooth than it appeared, demonstrating the struggle President Abdu Rabbu Mansour Hadi faces to assert his new authority.
abstract: Yemeni President Abdu Rabbu Mansour Hadi has been slowly shedding his government of officials from the old administration who are either members of former president Ali Abdullah Saleh's family or staunch Saleh loyalists; this has not always gone easily, as the transfer from one military commander to another has turned out to be far less smooth than it initially appeared.
lead_paragraph: The transfer from one military commander to another turned out to be far less smooth than it appeared, demonstrating the struggle President Abdu Rabbu Mansour Hadi faces to assert his new authority.

headline.seo: For Hadi, Yemen’s New Leader, a Battle for Control
headline.main: For Yemen’s New President, a Battle for Control and a Tug of War With the Past
headline.print_headline: For Yemen’s New President, a Battle for Control and a Tug of War With the Past

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
